        public static CommunicationManager get()

      • getMasterNodeAddress

        public java.net.URL getMasterNodeAddress()

      • postFileNodeMapping

        public static boolean postFileNodeMapping(java.lang.String file_id,
                                          java.lang.String node_id)
        Posts the given file-node mapping to the master peer.
        Parameters:
        file_id - The file id
        node_id - The node id where the file was stored.
        Returns:
        True, if request was successful. False if not.

      • runDeletions

        public void runDeletions()

      • getPendingUploads

        public void getPendingUploads(DBResultOrdering resultOrdering)
        Fetches a list of all uploads currently pending. Results are published in the FilesReadyEvent.
        Parameters:
        resultOrdering - The order in which to return the files (e.g. newest or oldest first) (see DBResultOrdering).

      • getPendingUploadCount

        public int getPendingUploadCount()
        This method returns the number of files that are still to be uploaded by the framework.
        Returns:
        The number of files to upload, or -1 if something went wrong.

      • requestMetadata

        public void requestMetadata(java.lang.String fileUuid)
        This method downloads metadata for the given file UUID. Will only work if you are the owner of the file or if the file is public. You will be notified via the MetadataEvent event when the request has finished.
        Parameters:
        fileUuid - The file's UUID.

      • requestThumbnail

        public void requestThumbnail(java.lang.String fileId)
        Requests a thumbnail for the file with the given identifier.
        Parameters:
        fileId - The identifier of the file.
